results.content:
It’s a very nice course for beginners ….. This was a great course for me. I was put in a situation at work where I needed to understand jquery and javascript and this helped me bridge the knowledge gap. 
thank you!

results.content: Lectures are pretty much straight to the points. Contents are simple enough to understand for someone with minimal JavaScript coding experiences. Duration for each lecture video is just nice. Looking forward to taking another course with them.

response.content: Thank you so much for the review.
response.content_html: Thank you so much for the review.
